document.full_text: thai prime minister abhisit vejjajiva narrowly survived a parliamentary no-confidence vote on saturday, ensuring his government remains in office in the run-up to what is likely to be a close election.
document.title: thai pm scrapes through no-confidence vote
lines_and_colors: thai prime minister abhisit vejjajiva narrowly survived a parliamentary no-confidence vote on saturday, ensuring his government remains in office in the run-up to what is likely to be a close election.
